name: At the Heart of the Forest
name_original: At the Heart of the Forest
description:
You are not the Chosen One. But what do you do regardless? 

Ami is the stubborn little sister discontent with her weaknesses. She journeys into a forest of spirits where she seeks a fabled power. Explore a whimsical but mysterious land isolated from the world, where one’s resolve and heart is tested. 

Gameplay Controls:

  • Left and Right on the arrow keys allow the player to run left and right
  • Space Bar allows the player to jump. Jump to collect Star Fragments and to take out enemies.
  • On the title screen, click anywhere to start the game
  • The game might open very small. Just resize it, I don’t know why it does that.
  • To progress through the dialogue at the end of the game, press Space Bar

It is very short, about 5-10 minutes. It took about two weeks to make. I made it to improve and learn more about game development. Enjoy.
